column4: How workable is it to have / and /root and /boot on an LVM partition
aMSN is fugly. But still less so than windows live messenger et al
I've got flash 9 installed in firefox, but in konqueror and swiftfox, I only get flash 7.  Any idea how I can fix this?
uninstall flash 7
the strange thing is, I'm not sure why/how it *is* installed
if I do "aptitude search flash", it doesn't show anything isntalled
i'm nto sure why it'd be installed either
any idea where i can find the plugin directories?
/usr/lib/firefox/plugins ?
there's a libflashplayer.so in there.. can I find out somehow what version it is?  Or, does the browser have a plugins information tool?  I know Opera does.
about:plugins works in konq
should they all in theory use the same plugin directories?
yes
they are all usually symlinked to look in the same places
well both swiftfox and konq show flash 7 and flash 9 there, with the same filenames, so I guess they all must be looking in more than one place
that is possible
just waiting for find / -name libflashplayer.so to complete
there is a plugin section in konqueror's settings, see what path it is using for flash 7
not sure how that one got there.. the one in my home was flash 7, so I just deleted and restarted swiftfox and now its fine
thanks!
no problem
